author: INQUISITR
title: Here‚Äôs Jon Stewart‚Äôs Stunned Reaction to Trump‚Äôs Most Obvious Lie on ‚ÄòThe Daily Show‚Äô
text:
Here‚Äôs Jon Stewart‚Äôs Stunned Reaction to Trump‚Äôs Most Obvious Lie on ‚ÄòThe Daily Show‚Äô
Former President
Donald Trump's bold denial that he ever called for Hillary Clinton to be jailed left the host of The Daily Show Jon Stewart stunned. Trump's allegation over the weekend was so obviously untrue that following the playback of the video on his show, Stewart stood silent for a full fifteen seconds. Stewart's response when he eventually found his voice was simply priceless, per Uproxx.
‚ÄúWhat the f**k?‚Äù Stewart yelled, clearly frustrated, per
Deadline. ‚ÄúI think I remember you saying it ‚Äï to her face, at a debate.‚Äù This sharp reference was to Trump's notorious 2016 presidential debate comment to Clinton when he said she would ‚Äúyou‚Äôd be in jail‚Äù if he won. Stewart then went on to critique Trump's insolence with his customary sharp wit.
Jon Stewart looks at the fallout from Trump's conviction and makes a plea to the media. Full piece here:‚Äî The Daily Show (@TheDailyShow)
 [pic.twitter.com/0bQERVqcmt] [June 4, 2024]
‚ÄúTo be fair, I apologize, you did not say the words, ‚ÄòLock her up,‚Äô‚Äù Stewart sarcastically corrected himself. ‚ÄúYou only used a phrase synonymous with locking her up.‚Äù Stewart, though, wasn't done. ‚ÄúHe literally said ‚Äòlock her up‚Äô all the fucking time,‚Äù Stewart continued, cutting to a montage of footage that had Trump repeating the same phrase‚Äîwhich he now claims he has never said‚Äîrepeatedly.
After watching the video, which served as a sharp reminder of Trump's constant demands to put his political rival in jail, Stewart's disbelief gave way to obvious annoyance. Stewart slammed his desk with his hands, and he froze for 15 seconds! As soon as Stewart snapped out, he blasted the Fox News anchors who had interviewed Trump for not standing up to his flagrant lies.
üî• JON STEWART: ‚ÄúThis is why the ‚Äòlaw & order‚Äô right hates court procedures when applied to them‚Ä¶ it is the last place you have to prove what you say. The media must stop letting them act like there are 2 realities and challenge them to their faces.‚Äù‚Äî The Tennessee Holler (@TheTNHoller)
(cc: Tennessee media)
[pic.twitter.com/81VeZIIPCV] [June 4, 2024]
‚ÄúAnd he said it a million times!‚Äù Stewart cried out, criticizing the hosts for not calling him out. Stewart took use of the occasion to draw attention to a crucial aspect of the American legal system. ‚ÄúAnd that, ladies and gentlemen, I present to you, is why we need courts,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúWhatever flaws the American justice system has ‚Äî and they are legion, especially for non-billionaire former presidents ‚Äî it does appear to be the last place in America where you can‚Äôt just say whatever the f*** you want, regardless of reality.‚Äù
Stewart expressed his disdain for the conservative media without holding back, charging them with creating a climate in which such flagrant lies could proliferate unchecked. ‚ÄúTo admit their own political gamesmanship, their own attempts at weaponizing justice, their own relentless pursuit of opponents, their own dehumanizing rhetoric towards the left would be to allow a molecule of reality into the airtight distortion field that has been created to protect Magadonians from the harsh glare of actuality,‚Äù he fumed.
Stewart ended by drawing a comparison between the media circus and the courtroom. ‚ÄúThe difference between in court and out of court is that, in court, someone can say ‚Äòprove it,‚Äô‚Äù Stewart said. ‚ÄúAnd the problem is that most of the time in this country, our political leaders are not in court. They are here on TV, where the news media has decided that there‚Äôs really no such thing as reality.‚Äù

author: emma.
title: Northern Lights in the skies of the Alpes-Maritimes and Var: the most beautiful photos sent by our readers
text: The fiery colors were there, on the night of Thursday October 10 to Friday October 11, in the Alpes-Maritimes and the [Var](/tag/Var). Spectacular northern lights could indeed be observed in the sky of our two departments, as scientists had announced a few days earlier. Many readers of [Nice](/tag/Nice)-Matin and Var-Matin sent us beautiful photos during the night, after admiring this rare and unique spectacle. From Nice Here, a photo sent by Cassandra from Fabron Hill, in Nice. You can even see a shooting star, the highlight of the show! Whether from Vence, Carros, [Grasse](/tag/Grasse), Gr√©oli√®res or Lorgues, the C√¥te d‚ÄôAzur Weather Facebook page ‚Äì Livealso shared photos, each more spectacular than the last. But individuals were also able to have fun. Taken from Nice, this photo, sent by Ivar, is adorned with magnificent pink hues. Here a photo taken by Laurine from [Le Cannet](/tag/Le+Cannet). In the Var Same thing in the Var this fabulous night, where the sky was adorned with pink glow on the northern horizon, thanks to a solar storm which offered us its most beautiful hues. Here in Castellet, this photo, sent by Vincent, looks like a painting. The weather conditions were perfect for optimal observation. Thus, in places where light pollution was minimal, the lucky ones were able to see a sky tinted with purple and pink. At Luc, still in the Var, Dorian witnessed an incredible show, which he shared with us. Solar storms can be accompanied by coronal mass ejections, a flow of plasma made up of charged particles, which takes up to a few days to reach Earth. For a crazy show. Their interaction with the Earth‚Äôs magnetic field produces the Northern Lights, similar to gigantic, undulating, colorful curtains of light.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command
text:
Summary by Ground News Vice Admiral V Srinivas took charge as the 30th Flag Officer Commanding-in-Chief. He succeeded Vice Admiral M A Hampiholi, who retired after a distinguished four-decade career in the Indian Navy. He is one of only two Indian Navy officers to lead both a frontline warship and a nuclear submarine (INS Chakra) Share menu More

author: JoAnne Castagna
title: El Salvador picks thorium as part of its energy future -- ANS / Nuclear Newswire
text:
Director General Daniel Alvarez, left, and John Kutsch. (Photo: TEA)
Representatives of El Salvador‚Äôs government and the Thorium Energy Alliance have signed a memorandum of understanding to promote El Salvador‚Äôs plan for renewable energy through thorium.
The document was signed on March 14 by Daniel Alvarez, director general of energy, hydrocarbons, and mines, and John Kutsch, executive director of the Thorium Energy Alliance, at the El Salvador embassy in Washington, D.C. The signing was witnessed by Milena Mayorga, El Salvador‚Äôs ambassador to the United States.
The purpose of the agreement is to formally establish the framework for cooperation between the Thorium Energy Alliance and El Salvador to develop a strategic plan to deploy thorium-powered reactors and thermal energy storage systems. Thorium is a naturally occurring element that can be used as fuel to generate electricity in advanced nuclear reactors.
They said it: ‚ÄúI am pleased to announce the launch of this innovative project that will revolutionize the energy landscape of El Salvador,‚Äù said Alvarez.
Kutsch added, ‚ÄúThe leadership of El Salvador is rising and taking the bold steps necessary to ensure access to abundant and reliable energy, with the goal of ensuring a future of prosperity or all."
Mayorga noted, ‚ÄúThrough this effort, we are fulfilling President Nayib Bukele's mandate to consolidate the diversification strategy of our energy matrix to improve the economy and well-being of our citizens."
El Salvador‚Äôs energy: Currently, the bulk of the country‚Äôs electric power comes from fossil fuels, but gains are being made by hydropower, biomass, solar, and geothermal energy.
El Salvador uses about 6 million MWh of electric energy per year, according to WorldDate.info .
About the Alliance: The Thorium Energy Alliance is an education-focused organization composed of scientists and engineers who are committed to reducing the cost of energy, increasing the availability of critical materials, and protecting the environment.

author: Erika Cuscito
title: Il sindaco Decaro fa il "cazziatone" alle aziende che fanno male i ripristini dell'asfalto: ¬´Come promesso, vi multo¬ª | Corriere.it
text: Decaro: ¬´Sanzione gi√† fatta dal Comune¬ª La pericolosit√† delle "montagnette" create con l'asfalto viene mostrata durante la diretta live: una signora in monopattino viene invitata a salire sul dosso dal sindaco. La promessa di scendere in strada √® stata rispettata e Decaro si √® scagliato contro le aziende: ¬´Io nella vita mia facevo l'ingegnere delle strade all'Anas, dove lavoravo io un lavoro del genere non era possibile. Non l'avrei autorizzato e avrei fatto una sanzione che, per fortuna, il Comune di Bari dovrebbe aver gi√† fatto¬ª. Da qui la decisione comunicata dal sindaco, sempre nel corso della diretta, di non autorizzare pi√π lavori ¬´che nei prossimi anni ci sfasceranno tutte le strade¬ª. 25 gennaio 2024 ( modifica il 25 gennaio 2024 | 18:25) ¬©

author: Trevor Gould
title: Review: Dragon Takers (Nintendo Switch)
text:
Rarely do I see an RPG stubble and fall in such rapid succession, but Dragon Takers does just that. Despite some initial promise, it quickly makes one blunder after another. Sadly, this release is one of the most boring RPGs I‚Äôve ever played.
The main gimmick in this game is the protagonist‚Äôs newfound ability as a ‚ÄúSkill Taker.‚Äù He‚Äôs able to take moves from monsters during combat and pick and choose which to equip, limited only by what level you‚Äôve reached. There‚Äôs nothing inherently wrong with this idea. In fact, the variety of monsters (viewed in a first-person perspective) had me somewhat intrigued. But with the focus on combat, you‚Äôd hope this area excelled. Unfortunately, it‚Äôs not even close.
Rather than break into a long-winded rant, I‚Äôll limit my complaints to two key areas. The first (arguably foremost) is the curious decision to omit any means to escape a battle. Buried in the press release, it states, ‚Äúescape is not an option.‚Äù A bold choice, perhaps, but certainly not a smart one. It simply doesn‚Äôt fit this style of turn-based RPG. If the enemies were visible on the map, maybe I could be swayed, but it‚Äôs entirely random. And the combat is nowhere near enjoyable enough to justify the lack of such a fundamental option.
To further weaken combat, enemy resistances and weaknesses are listed on the side of the screen. I didn‚Äôt even notice this until I was a few hours in, as playing in handheld mode, the text was small. But it‚Äôs always present, even when playing in ‚ÄúNormal‚Äù difficulty. Add in the fact that the game autosaves nonstop, and it eliminates any challenge the lack of escape could‚Äôve leant. All you‚Äôre left with is the mundane tedium of combat that never really goes anywhere to reach its potential. Swing and a miss.
At least the game presents a solid audio/visual package. The music is very listenable, giving a blend of creepiness and relaxation that works better than you might expect, and I kind of like it. Characters bob their heads, move their arms, their hair flaps‚Ä¶ little things like that make them seem livelier. Of course, their expressions never change regardless of what is happening in the story, good or bad.
Speaking of story, there‚Äôs a reason I haven‚Äôt talked about that until six paragraphs into my review, and it‚Äôs not because of spoilers. It‚Äôs not done well. Dragon Takers is filled with long stretches of cliched dialogue. Sometimes, you‚Äôll have several minutes of generic conversation, take a step or two, and more will follow. I actually don‚Äôt mind this so much in the towns, as the NPCs feel more real. And talking to them is all you‚Äôll do in towns as items get acquired not at shops, but during combat or found in dungeons. But outside of this, the lead and his female allies chatting about another fantasy trope just made me want to take control and get on the move. Not that there is much to move to. Dragon Takers is an especially linear game, with tiny distances between towns and short maze dungeons. No allowance is there to go off the story path and explore.
Dragon Takers feels haphazardly slapped together, and the longer I played it, the more boring its stale gameplay became. I don‚Äôt know much about the developer (Vanguard), but if KEMCO is going to keep working with them, I hope they can steer them in smarter directions. Dragon Takers is a poor game that I can‚Äôt recommend.
Review: Dragon Takers (Nintendo Switch)
Poor
Dragon Takers feels haphazardly slapped together, and the longer I played it, the more boring its stale gameplay became. I don‚Äôt know much about the developer (Vanguard), but if KEMCO is going to keep working with them, I hope they can steer them in smarter directions.

title: Gran expectaci√≥n entre los portugueses por su selecci√≥n tras la desilusi√≥n de la Eurocopa
text: Lisboa, 5 sep (EFE).- Los portugueses esperan este jueves el regreso de su selecci√≥n a los terrenos de juego tras la desilusi√≥n de la Eurocopa de f√∫tbol, pero conf√≠an en que el equipo de Roberto Mart√≠nez volver√° a tener buenos resultados. Los alrededores del Est√°dio da Luz de Lisboa se llenaron de camisetas y bufandas rojiverdes para recibir a Croacia en la Liga de Naciones, en el primer partido de las \u0027quinas\u0027 despu√©s de caer en cuartos de final del Europeo ante Francia. IM√ÅGENES: PAULA FERN√ÅNDEZ CONTIENE IM√ÅGENES DEL AMBIENTE PREVIO AL ENCUENTRO DE LIGA DE NACIONES ENTRE PORTUGAL Y CROACIA, EN LISBOA. INCLUYE TOTALES DE VARIOS AFICIONADOS. TRADUCCI√ìN TOTALES: Jorge Soares: 1.- \"Hicimos una buena Eurocopa, tuvimos el partido contra Eslovenia que fue un buen partido, despu√©s con la victoria en los penaltis. Y la situaci√≥n con Francia fueron los penaltis. Los penaltis es siempre la suerte que tenemos que tener de saber defenderlos o tambi√©n marcarlos. Es suerte que tenemos que tener\". 2.- \"La expectativa es que mejoren, que los jugadores que han venido nuevos consigan ayudar a la selecci√≥n a mejorar su f√∫tbol\". Ant√≥nio: \"Siempre tenemos la expectativa de mejorar, independientemente de ser con un entrenador espa√±ol, o brasile√±o. Portugal est√° en los r√°nkings de los mejores de Europa y del mundo\". Melisa (totales en espa√±ol)

title: Amazon tiene en oferta la bocina port√°til perfecta para tus fiestas: resistente al agua, luces LED y sonido potente por menos de 1,300 pesos
text: Atr√°s quedaron esos tiempos en los que, para disponer de un potente equipo de sonido, se depend√≠a de una infraestructura espec√≠fica en entornos perfectamente delimitados, ya que ahora es muy f√°cil poner el ambiente en cualquier lugar con bocinsa port√°tiles de gran calidad como esta Tronsmart Bang Mini, la cual actualmente registra un 39% de descuento, sobre su costo de lista, que la deja en s√≥lo [1,299 pesos](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2FTronsmart-Bang-Mini-Bluetooth-SoundPulse%2Fdp%2FB0B93MRTWF%3Fpf_rd_r%3DZD3GETKHT4SXSC7DBTSH%26pf_rd_t%3DEvents%26pf_rd_i%3Ddeals%26pf_rd_p%3D86c48f54-bf25-4681-95f7-66e2ab397431%26pf_rd_s%3Dslot-14%26ref%3Ddlx_deals_gd_dcl_img_137_b188c293_dt_sl14_31&category=seleccion&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201685) en Amazon M√©xico. Bocina port√°til Tronsmart Bang Mini Esta bocina de [Tronsmart](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2Fstores%2FTRONSMART%2Fpage%2FF2B08BC6-FE2A-493B-BEC9-20FAA2B40363%3Fref_%3Dast_bln&category=seleccion&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201685) presenta un dise√±o resistente al agua con certificaci√≥n IPX6, capaz de resistir salpicaduras, roc√≠o y lluvia, siendo ideal para actividades al aire libre como playa, monta√±as, camping y m√°s. Adem√°s, su conexi√≥n NFC facilita el emparejamiento con dispositivos Android, mientras que con manijas robustas y port√°tiles, es f√°cil de llevar en la mano. Tambi√©n est√° equipada con tecnolog√≠a Bluetooth 5.3, lo que le permite una conexi√≥n m√°s r√°pida y eficiente. Adem√°s, cuenta con dos modos de iluminaci√≥n LED personalizables para adaptar la atm√≥sfera y sumergirse en la m√∫sica. Asimismo, cuenta con capacidad de emparejamiento est√©reo inal√°mbrico para conectar dos altavoces. Este producto se enviar√° sin costo a todas las personas, pero s√≥lo quienes cuenten con una [suscripci√≥n de Amazon Prime](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2Famazonprime%3Fref_%3Dnav_cs_primelink_member&category=seleccion&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201685) tendr√°n prioridad en los tiempos de entrega. Si a√∫n no formas parte del programa y deseas todos sus beneficios de forma gratuita, te sugerimos aprovechar el [per√≠odo de prueba del servicio](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2Famazonprime%3Fref_%3Dnav_cs_primelink_member&category=seleccion&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201685). Wonder‚Äô para Nintendo Switch, m√°s barato que nunca en Amazon con este in√©dito descuento que incluye meses sin intereses](https://www.xataka.com.mx/seleccion/super-mario-bros-wonder-para-nintendo-switch-barato-que-nunca-amazon-este-inedito-descuento-que-incluye-meses-intereses) En Xataka Selecci√≥n M√©xico | [El precio del ‚ÄòSuper Mario RPG‚Äô para Nintendo Switch sorpresivamente se desploma en Amazon M√©xico para costar menos de 900 pesos](https://www.xataka.com.mx/seleccion/precio-super-mario-rpg-para-nintendo-switch-sorpresivamente-se-desploma-amazon-mexico-para-costar-900-pesos) En Xataka Selecci√≥n M√©xico | [Amazon remata esta bocina JBL con casi 4,000 pesos de descuento: iluminaci√≥n de 360 grados, bater√≠a de hasta 12 horas y resistencia al agua](https://www.xataka.com.mx/seleccion/amazon-remata-esta-bocina-jbl-casi-4-000-pesos-descuento-luces-360-grados-bateria-12-horas-resistencia-al-agua) | | En
